title: Chaos Dragon: Sekiryuu Seneki
alternative_title: Chaos Dragon, Red Dragon War, ケイオスドラゴン 赤竜戦役
description: In the year 3015, the great nations Donatia and Kouran divide the world in a cold war as they fight for supremacy. Amidst this standoff is the island country Nil Kamui, which has lost its independence. Red Dragon, the guardian god of Nil Kamui, goes out of control. Will the island country manage to regain its independence?
